common.name: Name
common.onlyImageFilesAllowed: Only image files are allowed for profile pictures.

common.noPermissionEditJourney: You do not have permission to edit this journey.
common.noPermissionChangePublicStatus: You do not have permission to change the public status of this journey.
common.selectUserToAddCollaborator: Please select a user to add as a collaborator.
common.noPermissionAddCollaborators: You do not have permission to add collaborators to this journey.
common.noPermissionUpdateCollaboratorPermission: You do not have permission to update collaborator permissions for this journey.
common.noPermissionRemoveCollaborators: You do not have permission to remove collaborators from this journey.
common.fileNotImageOrVideo: File '{{fileName}}' is not an image or video.
common.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
common.locationRequestTimedOut: The request to get user location timed out.
common.authRequiredCreatePost: Authentication required to create a post.
common.selectJourneyBeforePost: Please select a journey before creating a post.
common.noPermissionCreatePost: You do not have permission to create posts in this journey.
common.atLeastTitleMessageMediaOrCoordsRequired: At least a title, message, media, or coordinates are required.
common.pleaseWaitForMediaUploads: Please wait for media uploads to complete.
common.authRequiredDeletePost: Authentication required to delete a post.
common.noPermissionDeletePost: You do not have permission to delete this post.
common.noPermissionEditPost: You do not have permission to edit this post.
common.journeyOwnerOrNameMissing: Journey owner username or journey name is missing.
common.noPermissionChangePassphrase: You do not have permission to change the passphrase for this journey.
common.authRequiredDeleteJourney: Authentication required or not authorized to delete journeys.
common.passphraseMinLength: Passphrase must be at least 6 characters long.
common.deletePostDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this post.

auth.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access your journeys and posts.
auth.firstAdminAccount: This will be the first (and only) user you can register. This user will be an administrator.

editPostDialog.clickGetLocation: Click 'Get current location' to fetch your position.
editPostDialog.noPermissionPublishDraft: You do not have permission to publish posts in this journey.

locationSearch.searchPlaceholder: Search for an address or place...

indexPage.loadDraftNotImplemented: Loading drafts directly into the form is not yet implemented.

adminPage.deleteUserDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user @{{username}} and all their associated journeys, posts, and collaborations.
adminPage.deleteJourneyDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the journey '{{journeyName}}' and all its associated posts and collaborator permissions.

manageJourneyDialog.allowCreatePosts: Allow user to create new posts in this journey
manageJourneyDialog.allowEditPosts: Allow user to edit existing posts in this journey
manageJourneyDialog.allowDeletePosts: Allow user to delete posts from this journey

manageJourneyDialog.passphraseIsSet: A passphrase is set for this journey.
manageJourneyDialog.clearPassphraseDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove passphrase protection for this journey.

imageCropper.adjustImageInstructions: Adjust the image to fit the circular crop area. Use the slider to zoom.
